bioghist.p: The Philadelphia Wood Committee for the North Part of the City provided firewood to families in need. John De la Mater, Isaac Davis, and Amos Hoops were the members of the committee for 1817. Joseph Rotch, Joseph Cresson, and Nathan Trotter were the members of the committee for 1818.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two small volumes. The volumes list the names of poor people in Northern Philadelphia who received firewood, the number of units ordered (usually 1), and the supplier. Wood suppliers include Isaac Davis, Amos Hoops, William Gerhard, Jacob Billmeyer and Joseph Howell. The 1817 volume lists 974 names and the 1818 volume lists 695 names.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
